name: Fruit fruit
description:
This is just the cutest game ever!
The happy hamster and all of the fruit fruits of NaNaLand are here to bounce around and play with you!
Match the colour and tap or swipe the matches,
if you missmatch then ou are out!
Sounds pretty easy but it might be just a bit hard anyway,
You do get the option to choose from 3 different play modes and set the hardness of the game so that everyone can enjoy the Fruit fruit game!
